entry.title: We are striking!
entry.content:
The Freiburg Galaxy Team is striking tomorrow the 20th of September. We will be joining the Scientists for Future and the Global Climate Strike organised in Freiburg.

We encourage all our users to schedule the workflows today and join one of the hundreds of strikes world-wide tomorrow.

Thanks Freiburg!

Like the sea we rise!
Liebes Klimakabinett, ihr habt euch mit den falschen angelegt...#AlleFuersKlima #FridaysForFuture pic.twitter.com/RW5jn9RnWf

— Fridays for Future Freiburg (@F4F_Freiburg) September 20, 2019
entry.summary: The Freiburg Galaxy Team is striking tomorrow the 20th of September. We will be joining the Scientists for Future and the Global Climate Strike organised in Freiburg.

entry.title: 8000 users, 6.000.000 jobs and 11.000.000 datasets
entry.content:
This week we are celebrating already 11 million datasets, 6 million jobs run on UseGalaxy.EU and 8 thousand users. Wow!!

This would not be possible without the support of de.NBI, ELIXIR, EOSC and the Freiburg Faculty of Medicine.

Thanks to all our users and people that have contributed to this project! Special thankts our partner sites Erasmus MC, Belgium and Pasteur and the Galaxy community.
entry.summary: This week we are celebrating already 11 million datasets, 6 million jobs run on UseGalaxy.EU and 8 thousand users. Wow!!

entry.title: Scientists must act on our own warnings to humanity

link.title: Scientists must act on our own warnings to humanity

entry.content:
From a recent Nature article:

We face interconnected planetary emergencies threatening our climate and ecosystems. Charlie J. Gardner and Claire F. R. Wordley argue that scientists should join civil disobedience movements to fight these unprecedented crises.

Non-violent civil disobedience — the active refusal of a citizen to obey certain laws, orders or commands of a government or occupying power — is demonstrably effective at initiating political change. Many of the most profound political and social changes of the past century were brought about in this way, and leading practitioners, such as Rosa Parks, Emmeline Pankhurst, Martin Luther King and Mohandas Ghandi, once reviled as dangerous dissenters, are today revered as heroes. Moreover, civil disobedience requires relatively few people to be effective, with sustained action by 3.5% of the population sufficient even to topple dictatorial regimes (E. Chenoweth and M. J. Stephan, Why Civil Resistance Works: The Strategic Logic of Nonviolent Conflict; Columbia Univ. Press, 2012).

Read the entire article and join us next week (20th September) for the Global Climate Strike.

More information needed? Please visit: https://www.scientists4future.org

entry.title: First ATACseq training material!
entry.content:
Many people are waiting for it! We are proud to present the first Galaxy training material on ATACseq data analysis.

ATAC-Seq (Assay for Transposase-Accessible Chromatin using sequencing) is a method to investigate the accessibility of chromatin and thus a method to determine regulatory mechanisms of gene expression.

This training material was started during the CoFest at GCC2019 and is developed by Lucille Delisle, Maria Doyle, and Florian Heyl. Thanks a lot for your contribution to Galaxy training material!

All our Galaxy training materials can be found on the GTN website.
entry.summary: Many people are waiting for it! We are proud to present the first Galaxy training material on ATACseq data analysis.

entry.title: Galactic September News
entry.summary: The September 2019 Galactic News is here!

entry.title: TIaaS Queue Status Update
entry.content:
We’ve seen the TIaaS Queue Status receive a lot of positive feedback. We’ve added two new features to support trainers using this service:

  • Auto-refresh: now you can turn this on to have the page automatically refresh every 5 seconds. This saves you pressing the refresh button constantly
  • Filtering by different time ranges: You can now select to see jobs in the past 1, 3, or 6 hours. Other numbers are possible via changing the URL

Check them out now on our test page!
entry.summary: We’ve seen the TIaaS Queue Status receive a lot of positive feedback. We’ve added two new features to support trainers using this service:
